New Records: Mitchell Marsh scores his maiden ODI World Cup century
Marsh and Warner register Australia's highest first-wicket partnership in ODI World Cups
Key Match Events: Marsh scores 121 runs off 108 balls, hitting 10 boundaries and nine maximums
The record opening stand between Warner and Marsh saw both of them completing their respective centuries
Miscellaneous Highlights: This is the first time that two Australian openers have scored centuries in ODI World Cups
Others: Australia lost their opening two matches in the tournament against hosts India and South Africa
The Aussies find themselves in the middle of the World Cup 2023 points table and are still two places off the top-four spots
